imagehandling.headerhandling

Class DicomHeaderExtractor

  • java.lang.Object
    • imagehandling.headerhandling.DicomHeaderExtractor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HeaderExtractor

    public class DicomHeaderExtractor
extends java.lang.Object
implements HeaderExtractor
    Implemtation of the interface HeaderExtractor for the image type "dcm" ("IMA").
    Author:
    Dominik Ridder

      • getHeader

        public java.lang.String getHeader(java.lang.String path)
        This method returning the Header of the given Dicom Image.
        Specified by:
        getHeader in interface HeaderExtractor
        Parameters:
        path - The Filesource, that containing the header information.
        Returns:
        The Header, as a String

      • extractHeader

        public void extractHeader(java.lang.String path,
                          java.lang.String outputdir)
        This method writing the header information in the same dictionary, where the Image is. The Name of the information file is the name of the Image, with ".header" instead of ".IMA" or ".dcm".
        Specified by:
        extractHeader in interface HeaderExtractor
        Parameters:
        path - The Filesourcedestionation, where the header should be readed from.
        outputdir - The Filedestination of the header files.

      • getInfo

        public java.lang.String getInfo(java.lang.String path,
                                java.lang.String item)
        Description copied from interface: HeaderExtractor
        Returns a single Attribute to a given path and the String item is used, to find the Attribute.
        Specified by:
        getInfo in interface HeaderExtractor
        Parameters:
        path - The Filepath of the File, that contains the header
        item - The value, that should be searched in the header
        Returns:
        A single Attribute.

      • getInfo

        public java.lang.String[] getInfo(java.lang.String path,
                                  java.lang.String[] items)
        Description copied from interface: HeaderExtractor
        Returns mutliple Attributes to a given path, so the header dont have to be loaded multiple times.
        Specified by:
        getInfo in interface HeaderExtractor
        Parameters:
        path - The Filepath of the file, that contains the header
        items - The value, for which is searched for in the header
        Returns:
        Mutliple Attributes in a String array

      • getInfo

        public java.lang.String getInfo(java.lang.String path,
                                java.lang.String regularExpression,
                                TextOptions topt)
        Description copied from interface: HeaderExtractor
        Returns to an given image path all informations, that matching to the regularExpression. The TextOptions defines the matching and the returning String.
        Specified by:
        getInfo in interface HeaderExtractor
        Parameters:
        path - The Path of the File, that contains the header.
        regularExpression - A String for which is searched in the header.
        topt - The TextOptions, that determinate, how the header lines are returned
        Returns:
        The Header information, that matches the regularExpression in the Header combined by the rules of the TextOptions
